se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.entity
Class SimpleBoss

java.lang.Object
  se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.entity.SimpleEnemy
      se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.entity.SimpleBoss
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Destructible, Enemy, Ship, Collidable, PhysicsViewportIntersectionListener, PositionEntity, Teamable, ResourceIdentifier, Timerable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultBossImpl
public abstract class SimpleBoss
extends SimpleEnemy
implements Timerable, Ship

Abstract superclass for different implementation of bosses. Implements some methods to be user by subclass to differentiate boss behavior

Method Detail

viewportIntersectionBegin

public void viewportIntersectionBegin()
Description copied from interface: PhysicsViewportIntersectionListener
Called when the object appears inside the viewport. Do not modify the physics world inside this method! The recommended approach is to schedule such a task for later execution outside the physics stepping (outside this method).

This method may be called multiple times without viewportIntersectionEnd() being called. This should be interpreted as if the intersection still is ongoing.

Specified by:
viewportIntersectionBegin in interface PhysicsViewportIntersectionListener
Overrides:
viewportIntersectionBegin in class SimpleEnemy

damage - The damage to be dealt.

fireWide

public void fireWide(Timer source)
Fires projectiles in a straight line. Only fires the BOSS_SPR* weapons. Cannot be used simultaneously with fireSpread() or fireSpreadAim()

fireSpread

public void fireSpread(Timer source)
Fires projectiles in a wide, spreading pattern. Only fires the BOSS_SPR* weapons. Cannot be used simultaneously with fireWide() or fireSpreadAim()

fireSpreadAim

public void fireSpreadAim(Timer source)
Fires projectiles in a wide, spreading pattern aimed towards the player. Only fires the BOSS_AIM* weapons. Cannot be used simultaneously with fireAim()

fireAim

public void fireAim(Timer source)
Fires projectiles aimed towards the player. Only fires the BOSS_AIM* weapons.
